mapper.insert: insert into post values(0, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{member_no}, #{writer}, #{pass}, #{ip}, now(), now(), 1);
mapper.update: update post set isLive = 0 where post_idx=#{post_idx};
update post set category=#{category}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date=now() where post_idx = #{post_idx};
mapper.select: select member_no from post where post_idx = #{post_idx};
